subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gerald Marzorati, editor of The New York Times Magazine, and Michael Kimmelman, chief art critic, are blogging the U.S. Open from the fan's perspective.
snippet: Gerald Marzorati, editor of The New York Times Magazine, and Michael Kimmelman, chief art critic, are blogging the U.S. Open from the fan's perspective.
